name: Cytokinyn
description:
TEXTLESS ARTCADE GAME!

Don't let this blossoming dandelion dry out! Quickly spread your roots trough the dirt to find vital water sources. 

Keyboard and Joystick compatibles. Joystick preferred.

Jam Site:  Global Game Jam Geneva

Jam Year: 2023

Platforms:  MS Windows, Web standard (HTML5, Java, JavaScript, Flash)

Tools And Technologies: GitHub, Unity (any product)

Technology Notes: Blender Photoshop Ableton Trello Miro Discord

Credits:

  • Gabriel Amalric (Ashfak) / 2D ENVIRONMENT ART & MOCK-UP / 3D MODELING / 3D TEXTURE PAINTING / CO-ART DIRECTOR / SNACK ENJOYER
  • Maximilien Mouthon - MODELING / RIGGING / ANIMATION
  • François Bréchet - MUSIC / SOUND DESIGN / CROISSANT PROVIDER
  • Farah - 2D CONCEPT ART / UI & UX DESIGN / ASSISTANT REGIONAL MANAGER
  • Megann - 2D CONCEPT ART / GRAPHIC DESIGN
